sentences.sContent: On one occasion, two eagles were trying to take a lamb from its mother and were struggling. A third eagle came in to distract the ewe and one of the others got the lamb.
sentences.sContent_eng: On one occasion, two eagles were trying to take a lamb from its mother and were struggling. A third eagle came in to distract the ewe and one of the others got the lamb.
sentences.sCn: 有可能情况是这样的，两只金雕试图从母羊手里夺走小羊羔，相持不下，第三只雕飞来转移了母羊的注意力，后来前面两只中的一只抓走了羊羔。

sentences.sContent: The resulting hybrid was grown into a tiny embryo known as a blastocyst, implanted into the womb of a surrogate mother, and went on to become Dolly, the world's most famous ewe.
sentences.sContent_eng: The resulting hybrid was grown into a tiny embryo known as a blastocyst, implanted into the womb of a surrogate mother, and went on to become Dolly, the world's most famous ewe.
sentences.sCn: 杂交后的细胞渐渐成长为一个小小的叫做胚泡的胚胎，被植入代孕母亲的子宫，然后就变成了多莉——世界最著名的母羊。
